title: City Of Rocks National Reserve: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         2014 Employees of City of Rocks National Reserve and Castle Rocks State Park during orientation training Wallace Keck  This is your National Reserve, and we've created a number of ways for you to get involved and give back.       NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 in 2016, but we are gearing up to celebrate now.  Check out the NPS Centennial Plans.    Volunteer Do you want to volunteer some time to improving the park?  We have opportunities that range from a few hours to several months.   Work With Us Maybe you want to become a ranger, or just work with us for a season.  We have that information just a click away.    Planning Finally, get involved in the planning of the Reserve, from offering comments and suggestions for improvement, to reading the detailed general management plan and environmental impact statement.  Provide thoughtful insights and help guide the park in the right direction.
